sentences.sContent: See if you can solve this riddle .
sentences.sCn: 看看你能不能猜出这个谜语。

synos.tran: 谜语；[矿业]粗筛；谜一般的人、东西、事情等

words.tran: 解谜；出谜题（riddle的过去分词形式）

trans.tranOther: to solve, explain, or interpret (a riddle or riddles)

trans.tranCn: 谜语；粗筛；谜一般的人、东西、事情等
trans.tranOther: a question that is deliberately very confusing and has a humorous or clever answer
